Akriti is the owner of a company which produces salt and sells it under the brand X. She wishes to ensure that she retains market share and does not lose out to competitors. She has narrowed down the possible courses of action to the following. A-Invest in creativity, innovations, quality and R&D to give the product a differential advantage while at the same time communicating to a wide range of people to maximise exclusiveness. B- Reduce costs through improving productivity in an attempt to maintain the pressure on prices and deter entry of competitors. Which of these strategies is most appropriate for Akriti?

Brand equity = Median of parameters used to judge brand awareness and brand image

Bableen launched a new talcum powder Fresh&Fair in 2008 and soon became a grand success due to the great market reach and demand of the product. It has enjoyed a market share of more than 50% for almost 9 years now. However, the brand is losing its lustre. Volumes are slipping and Bableen suspects that it is lack of variety in the brand which is causing this. Competition from brands such as Pond's and Liril has also come too close. Which kind of extension should Bableen look for?

Neeti launched a product X which is meant to provide essential nutrients to the human body which are not found in the Indian diet naturally. This product can be consumed by persons of all ages and is especially good for children and the aged. The product has gained enough popularity that it has become a common household name. In an interview, a 10 year old consumer of the product said 'X is like my grandfather'. Which aspect of the product has been reflected here?

Veera owns a diamond jewellery firm and started the tagline 'A diamond is forever'. She made it a household name as every couple identified the ring as a symbol of the eternity of their bond with each other. However, she wanted to create more demand. So, she started marketing the phrase 'Women of the world, raise your right hand' to identify the product with woman empowerment as well. Which marketing technique has she followed?
